name: Cross 4: Reboot
description: Cross 4: Reboot, a difficult 2D platformer with playful pixely graphics. Made for Windows and made / developed by Relli and MBM. (Note: Cross is a series of failed games that were just ideas, numbers 1-6 are being reworked, 4 is first priority. Also, there is an official soundtrack you should totally check out on MBM's channel.)
